autoChangeStatus.format: Status Embed Message has been updated to {statusText}.
autoChangeStatus.successLog: Successfully set the status message in {channelName}.
autoChangeStatus.enableAutoChangeStatus: To set the server status, send a {cmd} command in the desired channel.
autoChangeStatus.playerAvatarGuildSuccessFull: Guild: `{playerAvatarGuildName}` was successfully found and set as the server for Player Avatar emojis.
autoChangeStatus.playerAvatarGuildUnSuccessFull: The Player Avatar Emoji's guild with ID `{playerAvatarGuildID}` could not be found, or the bot is not in the guild.

debug.botStatusFormat: Bot's activity has been updated to {botStatusText}.
debug.playerCountChUpdate: Player Count channel name is updated to {updatedName}.

checkErrorConfig.checkConfigWait: Checking for Errors in the config.js file. Please wait.
checkErrorConfig.followingErrors: Config file has the following errors:
checkErrorConfig.botPresenceStatus: Invalid bot status options. Should be 'online', 'idle', 'dnd' or 'invisible'.
checkErrorConfig.botStatusActivity: Invalid bot activity options. Should be 'Playing', 'Listening','Watching' or 'Competing'
checkErrorConfig.mcType: Invalid Minecraft server type. Should be "java" or "bedrock".
checkErrorConfig.mcName: The Minecraft server's name has not been specified.
checkErrorConfig.mcVersion: The Minecraft server's version has not been specified.
checkErrorConfig.guildID: The Server/Guild ID has not been specified or is invalid.
checkErrorConfig.timeZone: The time zone specified in the config file is not valid.
checkErrorConfig.slashCmdName:
The provided name "{givenCmdName}" for the "{cmdName}" command is invalid.
Please use only lowercase, uppercase, title case letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.

playerCountCh.playerCountChGuildIncorrect: The guild with ID: "{guildID}" was not found, or the bot is not in the guild.
playerCountCh.playerCountChannelFound: Successfully found channel: {channelName} for Player Count.
playerCountCh.playerCountChannelNotFound: The channel for Player Count with ID: "{channelId}" was not found, or the bot has no access to the channel.
playerCountCh.playerCountChannelCreated: Created a channel for Player Count and updated its name to: {updatedStatus}.

offline: Currently unable to locate the Minecraft server with:

commandInfoFormat.title: __**{cmdName} Command**__
commandInfoFormat.description:
**Slash command: {cmdSlashMention}
Description: `{cmdDescription}`
Prefix Commands: `{prefixCmd}`
Prefix Alias: {prefixCmdAlias}**

info.title: **Bot Info and Stats**
info.description:
**CPU Usage: `{cpuUsage}%`
Memory Usage: `{memoryUsage}MB`
Node.js Version: `{nodeVersion}`
Bot uptime: `{uptimeDays}` days, `{uptimeHours}` hours, `{uptimeMinutes}`, minutes, `{uptimeSeconds}` seconds
Ping: Client `{ping}ms` | Websocket: `{websocket}ms` **

help.name: help
help.description: Sends the list of available commands.

options.name: command
options.description: Sends the details about a command.

ip.name: ip
ip.description: Sends the server address of the Minecraft server.

site.name: site
site.description: Sends the website/vote link of the Minecraft server.

version.name: version
version.description: Sends the version of the Minecraft server.

motd.name: motd
motd.description: Sends the Minecraft Server's Message of the Day (MOTD).
motd.errorReply: :warning:  **`An error occurred while retrieving the Message of the Day (MOTD).`**

players.name: players
players.description: Sends the list of players who are currently online on the Minecraft server.
players.errorReply: :warning:  **`An error occurred while retrieving the online players list.`**

status.name: status
status.description: Sends the current status of the Minecraft server.
status.errorReply: :warning:  **`Unable to find the status of the server due to an error.`**

info.name: info
info.description: Sends the current information about the bot.

setstatus.name: setstatus
setstatus.description: Sets the status message of the Minecraft server in the current channel.
setstatus.serverName: Enter the name of your Minecraft server.
setstatus.serverIp: Enter the IP address of your Minecraft server.
setstatus.serverPort: Enter the port number of your Minecraft server.
setstatus.serverType: Choose your server type: Java or Bedrock
setstatus.playerAvatar: Option for ADMINS to display player avatars alongside the player list.
setstatus.errorReply: :warning:  **`Could not set the status message due to an error: {error}.`**
setstatus.enableFeature: **Please enable `auto Change Status` in the config to enable the status message feature.**
setstatus.checkingStatusCmdMsg: :arrows_clockwise: Checking the status and necessary info.
setstatus.statusMsgSuccess: :white_check_mark: **Status message is set successfully in {channel}. Message:** {messageLink}.

status.onlineReply: The server is currently **`üü¢ONLINE`** with **`{playerOnline}/{playerMax}`** active players.
